metadata.title: CVE-2019-6251 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
WebKitGTK and WPE WebKit prior to version 2.24.1 are vulnerable to addressbar spoofing upon certain JavaScript redirections. An attacker could causemalicious web content to be displayed as if for a trusted URI. This issimilar to the CVE-2018-8383 issue in Microsoft Edge.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6251` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
